title: Bravo's Chat Room
overview: Bravo's Chat Room will cover some of the biggest headlines in pop culture and O-M-G Bravo moments, while also addressing personal experiences and current events. Bringing unique perspectives and tons of humor to the table, the hosts will unapologetically share their stance and experiences. Taped remotely from each panelist's home, viewers will get a front row seat to the lives of these Bravolebrities who are ready to speak their truths and spill the tea.
